metadata.Title: CVE-2019-13602 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.Description: An Integer Underflow in MP4_EIA608_Convert() in modules/demux/mp4/mp4.c in VideoLAN VLC media player through 3.0.7.1 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (heap-based buffer overflow and crash) or possibly have unspecified other impact via a crafted .mp4 file.

criterions.comment: vlc package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.0.7.1-3').
